title: MERC grants 5-yr extension for power supply from Tata Power's Trombay units
description: The Maharashtra Electricity Commission (MERC) has instructed Tata Power's distribution arm in Mumbai to extend its power purchase agreement (PPA) with the company's generating units for an additional five years. The decision allows for the continued generation from Tata Power's units in suburban Trombay.
